properties.address: Riverside Community Centre, Newton Abbot, Devon TQ13 9AW
properties.description: Our warm and friendly space is open to all.
properties.title: Bovey Tracey Library

properties.address: Methodist Church, Newton Abbot, Devon TQ13 9AD
properties.description: FREE hot drinks and snacks amongst friendly faces at our weekly Social Supermarket, with colouring for bigger ones of all ages. Plus our social supermarket allows residents of TQ12/13 and surrounding villages to access good quality food and groceries for £4.50 whilst helping to reduce food waste!
properties.title: Bovey Tracey Social Supermarket

properties.address: Methodist Church, Newton Abbot, Devon TQ13 9AD
properties.description: Open to all. Free teas, coffees, snacks and delicious homemade soup with bread (donation pot is available). Bovey Food Hub is open 12pm to 1pm in the same space as well as the CAB.
properties.title: Bovey Warm Hub

properties.address: Ashburton Town Hall, Ashburton, Devon TQ13 7QQ
properties.description: The space is open to all. Refreshments available at nominal or no cost. Occasionally there are community stalls
properties.title: Coffee morning

properties.address: The Avenue Church, Newton Abbot, Devon TQ12 2BY
properties.description: The Avenue Church offers a warm, welcoming space, providing company for the lonely, and a place to make new friends over coffee and cake.
properties.title: Coffee Morning

properties.description: Open to all. Hot drinks and biscuits.
properties.title: Company & Coffee in Sidwell St Methodist Church

properties.description: Exeter Library is a vibrant community hub in the heart of the city, offering a warm and welcoming space for everyone. We provide free Wi-Fi, comfortable seating, and a wide selection of books, newspapers, and magazines to enjoy. Our facilities include computer access, a café for hot drinks and snacks, and quiet areas for relaxation or study. Regular events and activities cater to all ages, from Bounce & Rhyme sessions for children to creative workshops and social groups for adults. Whether you’re looking to stay warm, connect with others, or explore new interests, Exeter Library is here to support you. Open seven days a week, we are committed to creating a safe and inclusive environment for all members of the community.
properties.title: Exeter Library

properties.description: Exwick Parish Hall is open to EVERYONE Friday mornings 10-12 term time. Come in for a cup of coffee and a friendly chat. There's a toddler area with plenty of toys, and outdoor Forest School most weeks. We also offer assistance if you're struggling with connecting online.
properties.title: Friday Friendship Coffee Morning

properties.address: Tedburn St Mary Village Hall, Tedburn st Mary, Exeter EX6 6DZ X
properties.description: A monthly Friday lunch, open for drop-ins 12-2pm in the JB Room of the village hall. We cater for all ages. (Please note- not every Friday, we open once per month. Upcoming dates are 11th April, 9th May, more to be announced soon). Seasonal homemade main course and dessert, with a vegetarian option always available. Come and enjoy a sociable lunchtime and help reduce food waste too! We often finish with a game of cards for those who'd like to join in.
properties.title: Lunch Break Tedburn St Mary

properties.address: South Street Baptist Church, Exeter, Devon EX1 1JA
properties.description: We have 3 spaces to welcome people this year: Dove Cafe (Tuesday from 10:30 - 2pm) Space (First and third week of the month from 6:30 -9pm) Young people with YMCA Renew Refresh (Thursday from 1:30 - 4pm)
properties.title: Palace Gate Centre

properties.description: Dove Cafe is a community cafe offering a safe and welcoming space for all. We're open every Tuesday from 10:30 - 2pm. Renew Refresh is a safe space in which it's ok not to be ok. This space is open every Thursday from 1:30 - 4pm.
properties.title: South Street Baptist Church

properties.description: The food hub is open to all, we have a community fridge, swap shop, and also run cooking classes and lunch clubs. You are welcome to come in, and sit in the sofa area any time we're open, Monday - Thursday 10am-3pm.
properties.title: St Thomas Community Food Hub

properties.description: A friendly welcome in a warm, modern church hall. There is space to sit with your choice of free refreshments, and also toys and activities for children. Tech Cafe offer support in the first Thursday of each month.
properties.title: St Thomas Parish Church, Exeter

properties.address: Methodist Church, Newton Abbot, Devon TQ13 9AD
properties.description: The space is open to all from 10am-5pm every Tuesday. Offers hot food and drinks, friendly chat, games, help and advice from many local agencies (Citizens Advice, Community Police, Anna Chaplaincy, Debt Advice) Afternoon Social Supermarket.
properties.title: Tuesday Hub
